property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character cannot be saved.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +1 STR if it is a 'Stark' character. Attached character gets -1 STR if it is a non-'Stark' character. Any phase: move Frostbite to another character (limit once per phase).

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lady,House Mormont,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Maege Mormont's STR cannot be lowered by non-plot card effects.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Stealth,No attachments,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Army characters gain stealth while attacking during 'Military' challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lower the cost for you to play gold cost event cards by 1. Event cards you play that have a gold cost cannot be cancelled.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Dreadfort Turncloaks from your hand, choose and discard a 'Stark' character from play. Dreadfort Turncloaks does not kneel to attack.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army,House Mormont,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Footmen of Bear Island's STR cannot be lowered by non-plot card effects.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army,House Mormont,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard Host of the Bear from play at any time your total initiative is 2 or lower.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tully,,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Each character with renown you control gets +1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: kneel and discard Forgotten Path from play (cannot be saved) to initiate an additional 'Military' challenge this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: While attached character has more attachments than any other character in play, attached character gets +1 STR,gains stealth, and does not kneel to attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: While attached character is attacking, opponents with a total initiative lower than yours cannot declare defenders.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: discard Myrcella Lannister from play (cannot be saved) to allow you to initiate an additional 'Intrigue' challenge this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Ser Armory Lorch is attacking, characters that have a Trait in common with Ser Armory Lorch may not be declared as defenders. Any phase: until the end of the phase Ser Armory Lorch gains a Trait of your choice (limit once per phase).

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Ambitious Sellsword from your hand, choose and discard a 'Lannister' character from play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army,House Clegane,-

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Impulsive Lordling gains a 'Military' and 'Power' icon while you are the first player.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army,House Clegane,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: until the end of the phase, Marching Dogs gains a Trait of your choice (limit once per phase).

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Mummer Troupe, attach the top 3 cards from your deck, face down, to it. Any phase: discard a face-down card attached to Mummer Troupe to give Mummer Troupe a Trait of your choice until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control a 'Greyjoy' character War Profiteer gets +2 STR. While you control a 'Targaryen' character, War Profiteer gains 'Any phase: return War Profiteer and all of its standing attachments to owner's hand.'

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Lord Tywin's Hall, attach the top 3 cards from your deck, face down, to it. Marshalling: kneel, and pay 1 gold, and discard a face-down card attached to Lord Tywin's Hall to return a character with an intrigue icon from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Coin Mint from your hand, attach the top 6 cards of your deck, face down, to it. Marshalling: kneel and discard X face-down cards attached to Coin Mint to lower the cost of the next card you play this phase by X.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +2 STR while it has a power icon. Attached character gets -2 STR while it does not have a power icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win a 'Power' challenge as attacker by 4 or more total STR, discard Edric Storm from play (cannot be saved) to initiate an additional 'Power' challenge this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control a 'Stark' character, Pirate of the Stormlands gains a 'Military' icon. While you control a 'Greyjoy' character, Pirate of the Stormlands gets +2 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Priestess of the Light is attacking, unique characters may not be declared as defenders.

property.value: Army,House Tyrell,-

property.value: Renown,No attachments,Stealth

property.value: Discard Ser Axell's Guard from play at any time your total initiative is 2 or lower.

property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Sorceress' Shadow, choose and discard a 'Baratheon' character from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Response: after attackers are declared during a 'Power' challenge, True Believers claims 1 power (limit once per phase).

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tyrell,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Vanguard of the Rose does not kneel to attack if you are the first player.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you are the first player, The Valyrian gains 'Challenges: kneel to choose and stand a 'Baratheon' characater'

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel and pay 2 gold to shuffle your discard pile. Reveal one of those cards at random, and put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains the Ally and Mercenary traits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after attached character is knelt, discard 1 power from its owner's House.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lower the income on each opponent's plot card by 1 (or by 2 if that player's total initiative is 2 or lower).

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: discard Doomed Longshipman from play (cannot be saved) to save a 'Greyjoy' character from being killed or discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lower the cost to play Euron's Crew by 2 if you are the first player this round.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control a 'Baratheon' character, Ward of Pyke gains renown. While you control a 'Lannister' character, Ward of Pyke gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Kingsmoot Candidate from your hand, choose and discard a 'Greyjoy' character from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Storm Raiders from your hand, discard all locations from play (cannot be saved). You cannot play locations from your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Renown,No attachments,-

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army,House Harlaw,-

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,Stealth,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: kneel and place Longship 'Iron Victory' on the bottom of your deck (cannot be saved) to choose and kill an attacking or defending character (cannot be saved).

property.name: Traits
property.value: Iron Isles,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel and pay 2 gold to attach a character from your hand to Kingsmoot Grounds. That character is considered to be an attachment with a blank text box. Marshalling: kneel to remove attached card from Kingsmoot Grounds and put that card into play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Iron Isles,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: when an event card is played, kneel and discard Treacherous Shoals from play (cannot be saved) to cancel its effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +1 STR. If attached character is Strong Belwas, he also gains renown and 'Stand Strong Belwas at the beginning of dominance phase. Strong Belwas gets +4 STR during dominance phase.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: kneel one of your Dragon characters to kill attached character. Then, if its controller's initiative is 2 or lower, return Under Their Shadow to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aggo does not kneel to attack.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Xaro Xhoan Daxos from your hand, choose and return a character you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control a 'Stark' character. Agent in Westeros gains a 'Military' icon. While you control a 'Lannister' character, Agent in Westeros gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Challenges: during a 'Military' challenge, put Horseback Archers into play from your hand, knelt, as an attacker or defender. Then, at the end of that phase, if Horseback Archers is in in play, return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Lecherous Suitor from your hand, choose and discard a 'Targaryen' character from play. Lecherous Suitor gets +1 STR for each attachment you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Quartheen Fanatic gets +1 STR and a 'Military' icon while there is a Dragon character in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Shadow Conjurer from your hand, you may search your deck for an attachment card, reveal it to all players, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lower the cost to play Slavemasters by 1 for each Dragon character in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win or lose a challenge by 4 or more total STR, stand Warriors with Braids Uncut.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,Stealth,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: choose and discard a non-Dragon 'Targaryen' character you control (cannot be saved) to put Young Ko into play from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character loses an 'Intrigue' and a 'Power' icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character loses an 'Military' and a 'Intrigue' icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character loses an 'Military' and a 'Power' icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your house card. Discard all other attachments on this House card when played. Response: after you lose a challenge, kneel attached House card to choose one of your Martell characters. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR and gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: While attached character is attacking, characters with fewer than 2 different icons cannot be declared as defenders.

property.name: Text
property.value: Martell character only. Challenges: while attached character is participating in a challenge, kneel War Spear to choose another participating character with fewer than 2 different icons. Stand that character, and remove it from the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: cancel a card effect that would discard Areo Hotah from play. Until the end of the phase, treat that card as though its text were blank.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Arianne Martell is attacking, raise the Claim value on your plot card by 1.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bastard,Sand Snake,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you lose a 'Power' challenge by 4 or more total STR, choose a character controlled by the winning opponent. Discard all power from that character

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bastard,Sand Snake,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you lose an 'Intrigue' challenge by 4 or more total STR, the winning opponent must discard 1 card from his or her hand for each character without an 'Intrigue' icon he or she controls.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bastard,Sand Snake,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you lose a 'Military' challenge by 4 or more total STR, choose and kill a character without a 'Military' icon controlled by the winning opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenge: kneel to choose a 'Martell' character. Until the end of the phase that character gets +1 STR and gains stealth and renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win a challenge in which The Red Viper participates, attach the top card of your deck, face down, to the Red Viper. Challenges: discard a face-down card attached to The Red Viper to stand The Red Viper.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: kneel to choose a chracter. That character must be declared as an attacker during the next challenge initiated, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Handmaiden of Sunspear from your hand, attach the top 3 cards of your deck, face down, to it. Challenges: discard a face-down card attached to Handmaiden of Sunspear to give Handmaiden of Sunspear +2 STR for the duration of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Host of Sunspear is attacking, characters cannot be saved.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight,House Dayne,-

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play House Messenger from your hand, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck to all players. Then, put one of those cards into your hand, and the other on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: pay 2 gold to attach the top card of your deck, face down, to Maester of Sunspear. Response: discard a face-down card attached to Maester of Sunspear to save a character from being killed or discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you lose a challenge, choose and stand a 'Martell' character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Riders of the Boneway, attach the top X cards from your deck, face down, to it. Riders of the Boneway gets +1 STR for each face-down card attached to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: cancel a card effect that chooses Spearmaiden as a target

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after an opponent plays an event card that chooses one of your characters as the only target, kneel to copy the event's effects without paying its costs and ignoring play restrictions. Treat it as though you had played the event card from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Martell character gets +1 STR for each face-down card attached to it. Marshalling: pay 2 gold to attach the top card of your deck, face down, to a Martell character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel and pay 1 gold to attach the top card of your deck face down to The Old Palace. Challenges: during an 'Intrigue' challenge, kneel The Old Palace and discard X facedown cards attached to The Old Palace to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by X for the duration of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel and pay 1 gold to attach the top card of your deck face down to The Spear Tower. Challenges: during a 'Military' challenge, kneel The Spear Tower and discard X facedown cards attached to The Spear Tower to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by X for the duration of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel and pay 1 gold to attach the top card of your deck face down to Tower of the Sun. Challenges: during a 'Power' challenge, kneel Tower of the Sun and discard X facedown cards attached to Tower of the Sun to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by X for the duration of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel to lower the cost of the next 'Martell' card you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Round Sequence 1. Plot 2. Draw 3. Marshalling 4. Challenges 5. Dominance 6. Stand

property.name: Text
property.value: Round Sequence 1. Plot 2. Draw 3. Marshalling 4. Challenges 5. Dominance 6. Stand

property.name: Text
property.value: Round Sequence 1. Plot 2. Draw 3. Marshalling 4. Challenges 5. Dominance 6. Stand

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Bastard from your hand, discard all other attachments on attached character. Attached character gains the Bastard trait, loses a 'Power' icon and cannot have attachments played on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your House card. Marshalling: kneel attached House card and pay 1 gold to choose and discard from play a non-neutral card whose House does not match its controller's House or one of the Houses of his or her Alliance (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: kneel to choose a participating non-Army character. Stand that character, and remove it from the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Ser Arys Oakheart is standing, the cost to play cards cannot be lowered.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters you control without attachments count as though they have one attachment even if they have the keyword 'No attachments'.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: kneel to choose and discard a face-down attachment from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: pay 2 gold to attach the top card of your deck , face down, to Fawning Courtier. Challenges: kneel and discard a face-down card attached to Fawning Courtier to choose and kneel a character without an 'Intrigue' icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: pay 1 gold to choose and discard a Decree attachment from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Queen's Assasin from your hand, choose and discard an Ally, Mercenary or Bastard character from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Bandit Lord from your hand, choose and discard from play a non-limited location with cost 3 or lower, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: choose and kneel a King's Landing location.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: kneel to draw a card. Use this ability only if you have a higher total initiative than each opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a King's Landing location is knelt, its controller must attach the top card of his or her deck to it, if able. Locations are discarded from play at any time they have 2 or more face down cards attached.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel to lower the gold cost of the next event card you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after one of your Martell characters is killed, choose and kill a character with equal or lower STR. Limit 1 per phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark or Stark Alliance only. Marshalling: pay 3 gold to search your deck for a location card with printed cost 2 or lower, and put that card into play. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose one of your participating characters to get +X STR for the duration of the challenge. X is your total initiative.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister or Lannister Alliance only. Marshalling: pay 2 gold to name a card. Each opponent then reveals his or her hand and discards all cards with that name.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: pay 3 gold to attach the top 4 of your deck, face down, to any number of characters you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: pay 1 gold to discard Greater Glory Calls from your hand and draw a card. Challenges: characters with the Knight or Lord Trait cannot be declared as attackers or defenders this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon or Baratheon alliance only. Marshalling: pay 4 gold to put into play a character from your dead pile. That character claims 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell or Martell Alliance only. Any phase: choose and kneel or stand a location.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister or Lannister Alliance only. Marshalling: pay 2 gold to reveal the top X cards of your deck, put one into your hand, and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. X is your total initiative.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: pay 2 gold to lower the cost of the next character you play this phase by X. X is your total initiative. Limit 1 per phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: put into play from their owners' dead piles or discard piles all characters that were killed or discarded from play this phase. Any opponent may discard his or her hand to cancel this effect. Limit 1 per phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Challenges: until the end of the phase, Warship locations you control count as characters with STR equal to their printed cost and gain a 'Military' and 'Power' icon. They no longer count as locations, and if they leave play for any reason, they are placed in their owner's discard pile instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Challenges: each opponent with a total initiative of 2 or lower chooses and kneels one of his or her standing characters, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Challenges: until the end of the phase, characters and locations cannot be saved.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell or Martell Alliance only. Marshalling: pay X gold to reveal the top X cards from your deck and put them into your hand. Then discard X cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Challenges: choose a character without any power. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as an attacker or defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: put into play a 'Targaryen' character from your hand or discard pile with printed cost lower than your total initiative. At the end of the phase, if that character is in play, return that character to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Response: play after an opponent puts a character into play from his or her hand. He or she must choose: either discard that character from play (cannot be saved) or pay 2 gold. Limit 1 per phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: pay 2 gold to search your deck for a 'Stark' character with cost 4 or higher, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: play only if you have won a 'Military', an 'Intrigue' and a 'Power' challenge this phase. End the challenge phase, and proceed to the next phase this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy or Greyjoy Alliance only. Marshalling: pay 4 gold to choose 2 locations. Discard those locations from play (cannot be saved if their owner's total initiative is 2 or lower).

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell Only. Response: play after you lose a challenge by 4 or more total STR. Choose and discard from play a participating character with STR 3 or lower (cannot be saved). Limit 1 per challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: during a challenge, stand all Dothraki characters. At the end of the challenge, kneel all Dothraki characters.

card.name: The Bear and the Maiden Fair

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: choose a player. Until the end of the phase, that player gets -4 to his or her total initiative.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell Only. Response: cancel a response effect just played or triggered.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Challenges: choose a character with only an 'Intrigue' icon. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a 'Power' and 'Military' icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose a participating Martell character. For the duration of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR and gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: play only if you have lost 2 challenges this phase. The Red Viper and each Sand Snake character in play claims 1 power. Limit 1 per phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: save a 'Greyjoy' character from being killed. That character gets +3 STR until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Marshalling: pay 4 gold to choose and kill a non-'Stark' character. If its controller's total initiative is 2 or lower, that character cannot be saved.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, search your deck for a non-unique character, reveal it to all players, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, search your deck for a 0-cost location, reveal it to all players, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players may not trigger card abilities this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, discard your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose and kneel up to two unique characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the marshalling phase, players cannot play attachments, locations or events.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Characters you control do not kneel to attack this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lower the initiative on each opponent's revealed plot card to 0.
